quiz.question: startle ______
quiz.explanation: 惊吓，容易受惊。The nervous cat would startle easily at any sudden noise. 紧张的猫会容易受到任何突然的噪音惊吓。

quiz.question: chortle _______
quiz.explanation: 咯咯笑，快乐地咯咯笑。The children would chortle happily at the puppet show. 孩子们会在木偶表演时快乐地咯咯笑。

quiz.question: hurtle ____
quiz.explanation: 猛冲，猛冲过去。The race car would hurtle past at incredible speed. 赛车会以惊人的速度猛冲过去。

quiz.question: nestle _____
quiz.explanation: 依偎，依偎紧密。The kitten would nestle close to its mother for warmth. 小猫会依偎在母亲身边取暖。

quiz.question: ______ ___ pestle
quiz.explanation: 研钵，研钵和杵。The pharmacist ground herbs with a mortar and pestle. 药剂师用研钵和杵研磨草药。

quiz.question: ____ trestle
quiz.explanation: 支架，木支架。The old railway crossed the valley on a wood trestle bridge. 旧铁路通过一座木支架桥横跨山谷。

quiz.question: _______ match
quiz.explanation: 摔跤，摔跤比赛。The championship wrestle match attracted thousands of fans. 冠军摔跤比赛吸引了数千名粉丝。

quiz.question: bristle ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 发怒，怒发冲冠。He would bristle with anger at any criticism. 他会对任何批评怒发冲冠。

quiz.question: ______ crowd
quiz.explanation: 推挤，推挤人群。Passengers would jostle crowd trying to board the train. 乘客们会推挤人群试图登上火车。

quiz.question: ____ bustle
quiz.explanation: 喧嚣，城市喧嚣。She enjoyed the energy of city bustle during rush hour. 她喜欢高峰时段城市喧嚣的活力。

quiz.question: ______ rustle
quiz.explanation: 沙沙声，树叶沙沙声。The autumn leaves rustle gently in the breeze. 秋天的树叶在微风中轻轻沙沙作响。

quiz.question: ____ rattle
quiz.explanation: 拨浪鼓，婴儿拨浪鼓。The infant shook the colorful baby rattle happily. 婴儿快乐地摇着五颜六色的婴儿拨浪鼓。

quiz.question: _____ prattle
quiz.explanation: 闲聊，愚蠢的闲聊。Don't waste time on such silly prattle. 不要在这种愚蠢的闲聊上浪费时间。

quiz.question: ________ nettle
quiz.explanation: 荨麻，刺人的荨麻。She accidentally brushed against stinging nettle in the garden. 她在花园里不小心碰到了刺人的荨麻。

quiz.question: whittle ____
quiz.explanation: 削，削木头。The old man would whittle wood to create small figurines. 老人会削木头制作小雕像。

quiz.question: _____ spittle
quiz.explanation: 唾沫，嘴里的唾沫。The angry speaker sprayed mouth spittle while shouting. 愤怒的演讲者在大喊时喷出嘴里的唾沫。

quiz.question: _______ glass
quiz.explanation: 易碎的，易碎的玻璃。The ancient artifact was made of brittle glass that could shatter easily. 这件古代文物是用易碎的玻璃制成的，很容易破碎。

quiz.question: ______ pattern
quiz.explanation: 斑驳，斑驳的图案。The snake's skin had an interesting mottle pattern. 蛇的皮肤有有趣的斑驳图案。

quiz.question: scuttle ____
quiz.explanation: 急忙逃跑，急忙逃跑。The cockroach would scuttle away when the light turned on. 当灯打开时，蟑螂会急忙逃跑。

quiz.question: ____ ridicule
quiz.explanation: 嘲笑，公开嘲笑。The politician faced open ridicule for the foolish statement. 这位政治家因愚蠢的声明而面临公开嘲笑。

quiz.question: minuscule ______
quiz.explanation: 极小的，极少量。Only a minuscule amount of the substance was needed. 只需要极少量的物质。

quiz.question: overrule ________
quiz.explanation: 否决，否决决定。The judge had the power to overrule decision of the jury. 法官有权否决陪审团的决定。

quiz.question: ____ pustule
quiz.explanation: 脓疱，皮肤脓疱。The infection caused painful skin pustule to form. 感染导致疼痛的皮肤脓疱形成。

quiz.question: _____ gargoyle
quiz.explanation: 滴水嘴兽，石雕滴水嘴兽。The cathedral featured grotesque stone gargoyle on its roof. 大教堂屋顶上有怪诞的石雕滴水嘴兽。

quiz.question: bamboozle _____
quiz.explanation: 欺骗，欺骗人群。The con artist tried to bamboozle crowd with false promises. 骗子试图用虚假承诺欺骗人群。

quiz.question: dazzle ____
quiz.explanation: 使眩目，使眼睛眩目。The bright stage lights would dazzle eyes of the performers. 明亮的舞台灯光会使表演者的眼睛眩目。

quiz.question: fizzle ___
quiz.explanation: 失败，渐渐失败。The ambitious project would fizzle out due to lack of funding. 这个雄心勃勃的项目会因资金不足而渐渐失败。

quiz.question: _____ drizzle
quiz.explanation: 细雨，小细雨。A light drizzle fell throughout the afternoon. 整个下午下着小细雨。

quiz.question: ____ grizzle
quiz.explanation: 哭闹，婴儿哭闹。The tired baby grizzle constantly despite being fed. 疲倦的婴儿尽管已经喂饱了还是不断哭闹。

quiz.question: _____ sizzle
quiz.explanation: 咝咝声，牛排咝咝声。The juicy steak sizzle on the hot grill. 多汁的牛排在热烤架上咝咝作响。

quiz.question: ___ muzzle
quiz.explanation: 口套，狗口套。The aggressive dog muzzle prevented it from biting. 给攻击性强的狗戴上口套防止它咬人。

quiz.question: inflame _______
quiz.explanation: 激起，激起激情。The revolutionary speech would inflame passion in the crowd. 革命性的演讲会激起人群的激情。

quiz.question: selfsame ___
quiz.explanation: 完全相同的，完全相同的一天。They both arrived on the selfsame day by coincidence. 他们巧合地在完全相同的一天到达。

quiz.question: ______ chime
quiz.explanation: 钟声，教堂钟声。The church chime rang out across the village at noon. 中午时分，教堂钟声响彻整个村庄。

quiz.question: _____ grime
quiz.explanation: 污垢，厚重的污垢。Years of thick grime covered the abandoned building. 多年的厚重污垢覆盖着废弃的建筑物。

quiz.question: ________ pastime
quiz.explanation: 消遣，最喜欢的消遣。Reading novels was her favorite pastime on weekends. 读小说是她周末最喜欢的消遣。

quiz.question: unwelcome _____
quiz.explanation: 不受欢迎的，不受欢迎的客人。The party crasher was an unwelcome guest at the celebration. 这个不速之客是庆祝活动中不受欢迎的客人。

quiz.question: meddlesome ________
quiz.explanation: 爱管闲事的，爱管闲事的邻居。The meddlesome neighbor constantly asked personal questions. 这个爱管闲事的邻居不断问私人问题。

quiz.question: ________ murder
quiz.explanation: 可怕的，可怕的谋杀。The detective investigated the gruesome murder scene. 侦探调查了可怕的谋杀现场。

quiz.question: _________ task
quiz.explanation: 令人疲倦的，令人疲倦的任务。Filing paperwork was a wearisome task that nobody enjoyed. 整理文件是一项令人疲倦的任务，没有人喜欢。

quiz.question: ________ enemy
quiz.explanation: 可怕的，可怕的敌人。The warriors faced a fearsome enemy in battle. 战士们在战斗中面对可怕的敌人。

quiz.question: _____ fume
quiz.explanation: 烟雾，有毒烟雾。The factory released toxic fume into the atmosphere. 工厂向大气中释放有毒烟雾。

quiz.question: _____ plume
quiz.explanation: 羽状物，烟羽。A large smoke plume rose from the burning building. 一大股烟羽从燃烧的建筑物中升起。

quiz.question: _______ innocence
quiz.explanation: 假定，假定无罪。The legal system must presume innocence until proven guilty. 法律系统必须假定无罪，直到被证明有罪。

quiz.question: wolfsbane ______
quiz.explanation: 乌头，乌头毒药。The ancient herbalist warned about the deadly wolfsbane poison. 古代草药师警告致命的乌头毒药。

quiz.question: _______ chores
quiz.explanation: 平凡的，平凡的家务。She grew tired of mundane chores like washing dishes. 她厌倦了洗碗之类平凡的家务。

quiz.question: _____ mane
quiz.explanation: 鬃毛，马鬃毛。The stallion had a magnificent flowing horse mane. 这匹种马有一头飘逸的马鬃毛。

quiz.question: _____ windowpane
quiz.explanation: 窗玻璃，玻璃窗玻璃。The baseball shattered the glass windowpane. 棒球打碎了玻璃窗玻璃。

quiz.question: _______ vane
quiz.explanation: 风向标，风向标。The weather vane on the barn pointed north. 谷仓上的风向标指向北方。

quiz.question: ______ moon
quiz.explanation: 减弱，亏月。The waning moon grew smaller each night. 亏月每晚变得更小。

quiz.question: ______ sardine
quiz.explanation: 沙丁鱼，罐装沙丁鱼。She opened a can of tinned sardine for lunch. 她打开一罐罐装沙丁鱼作为午餐。

quiz.question: _______ space
quiz.explanation: 限制，限制空间。The prisoner was kept in a small confine space. 囚犯被关在一个小的限制空间里。

quiz.question: _________ sugar
quiz.explanation: 特细的，特细糖。The recipe required superfine sugar for the delicate cake. 这个配方需要特细糖来制作精致的蛋糕。

quiz.question: labyrinthine ____
quiz.explanation: 迷宫般的，迷宫般的小径。The hiker got lost in the labyrinthine path through the forest. 徒步旅行者在穿过森林的迷宫般的小径中迷路了。

quiz.question: _____ loudly
quiz.explanation: 哀鸣，大声哀鸣。The spoiled child would whine loudly when denied treats. 被宠坏的孩子在被拒绝零食时会大声哀鸣。

quiz.question: _____ incline
quiz.explanation: 斜坡，陡坡。The cyclists struggled up the steep incline. 骑自行车的人艰难地爬上陡坡。

quiz.question: ________ reporter
quiz.explanation: 场边，场边记者。The sideline reporter interviewed players during halftime. 场边记者在中场休息时采访球员。

quiz.question: ____ _ beeline
quiz.explanation: 径直走向，径直走向。After work, he would make a beeline for his favorite restaurant. 下班后，他会径直走向他最喜欢的餐厅。

quiz.question: crystalline _________
quiz.explanation: 晶体的，晶体结构。The mineral had a beautiful crystalline structure under the microscope. 这种矿物在显微镜下有美丽的晶体结构。

quiz.question: crinoline _____
quiz.explanation: 衬裙，衬裙裙子。The Victorian lady wore a wide crinoline skirt. 维多利亚时代的女士穿着宽大的衬裙裙子。

quiz.question: ________ hairline
quiz.explanation: 发际线，后退的发际线。He was self-conscious about his receding hairline. 他对自己后退的发际线感到难为情。

quiz.question: _____ porcupine
quiz.explanation: 豪猪，多刺的豪猪。The spiny porcupine defended itself with sharp quills. 多刺的豪猪用尖锐的刺保护自己。

quiz.question: ___ supine
quiz.explanation: 仰卧，仰卧。The patient was instructed to lie supine on the examination table. 病人被指示在检查台上仰卧。

quiz.question: ____ aquamarine
quiz.explanation: 海蓝宝石，蓝色海蓝宝石。The ocean had a stunning blue aquamarine color. 海洋有令人惊叹的蓝色海蓝宝石颜色。

quiz.question: ____ tangerine
quiz.explanation: 橘子，成熟的橘子。She peeled a sweet ripe tangerine for her snack. 她剥了一个甜甜的成熟橘子作为零食。

quiz.question: _________ wolverine
quiz.explanation: 狼獾，凶猛的狼獾。The ferocious wolverine is known for its aggressive nature. 凶猛的狼獾以其好斗的天性而闻名。

quiz.question: __________ road
quiz.explanation: 蜿蜒的，蜿蜒的道路。The serpentine road wound through the mountains. 蜿蜒的道路穿过群山。

quiz.question: _______ for
quiz.explanation: 注定，注定为。She seemed destine for greatness from an early age. 她从小就似乎注定会取得伟大成就。

quiz.question: ____ ravine
quiz.explanation: 峡谷，深峡谷。The river carved a deep ravine through the landscape. 河流在地形中雕刻出一个深峡谷。

quiz.question: _____ swine
quiz.explanation: 猪，养猪。The farmer would raise swine for market sale. 农民会养猪出售到市场。

quiz.question: entwine ________
quiz.explanation: 缠绕，缠绕在一起。The lovers' fingers would entwine together as they walked. 恋人们走路时手指会缠绕在一起。

quiz.question: ____ cheekbone
quiz.explanation: 颧骨，高颧骨。The model had striking high cheekbone structure. 这位模特有引人注目的高颧骨结构。

quiz.question: woebegone ____
quiz.explanation: 愁眉苦脸的，愁眉苦脸。The lost puppy had a woebegone face that melted hearts. 走失的小狗有一张愁眉苦脸，让人心软。

quiz.question: hone ______
quiz.explanation: 磨练，磨练技能。Years of practice helped her hone skills to perfection. 多年的练习帮助她将技能磨练得完美。

quiz.question: ___ megaphone
quiz.explanation: 扩音器，使用扩音器。The cheerleaders would use megaphone to amplify their voices. 啦啦队员会使用扩音器放大声音。

quiz.question: ___ crone
quiz.explanation: 老太婆，老老太婆。The fairy tale featured an old crone living in the woods. 这个童话故事中有一个住在树林里的老老太婆。

quiz.question: _____ strike
quiz.explanation: 无人机，无人机打击。The military conducted a precise drone strike on the target. 军方对目标进行了精确的无人机打击。

quiz.question: ______ prayer
quiz.explanation: 吟诵，吟诵祈祷文。The monks would intone prayer in the monastery chapel. 僧侣们会在修道院教堂吟诵祈祷文。

quiz.question: ____ undertone
quiz.explanation: 暗示，阴暗的暗示。The cheerful conversation had a dark undertone of tension. 欢快的谈话有一种阴暗的紧张暗示。

quiz.question: _______ headstone
quiz.explanation: 墓碑，花岗岩墓碑。The cemetery featured weathered granite headstone. 墓地里有风化的花岗岩墓碑。

quiz.question: __________ wheel
quiz.explanation: 磨石，磨石轮。The blacksmith sharpened tools on the grindstone wheel. 铁匠在磨石轮上磨快工具。

quiz.question: _______ rune
quiz.explanation: 符文，古代符文。The stone was carved with mysterious ancient rune. 这块石头上刻着神秘的古代符文。

quiz.question: _____ tree
quiz.explanation: 修剪，修剪树木。Gardeners must prune tree regularly to maintain health. 园丁必须定期修剪树木以保持健康。

quiz.question: _____ misfortune
quiz.explanation: 不幸，巨大的不幸。The family suffered great misfortune after the accident. 这个家庭在事故后遭受了巨大的不幸。

quiz.question: ____ foe
quiz.explanation: 敌人，宿敌。Batman faced his arch foe the Joker once again. 蝙蝠侠再次面对他的宿敌小丑。

quiz.question: ____ horseshoe
quiz.explanation: 马蹄铁，铁马蹄铁。The blacksmith hammered a hot iron horseshoe into shape. 铁匠把一块热铁马蹄铁敲打成型。

quiz.question: _________ mistletoe
quiz.explanation: 槲寄生，圣诞槲寄生。Couples kissed under the Christmas mistletoe at the party. 情侣们在聚会上在圣诞槲寄生下接吻。

quiz.question: _____ __ tiptoe
quiz.explanation: 踮起脚尖，踮起脚尖站立。She had to stand on tiptoe to reach the top shelf. 她不得不踮起脚尖站立才能够到顶层架子。

quiz.question: ____ woe
quiz.explanation: 悲哀，深深的悲哀。The bereaved family was overcome with deep woe. 丧亲的家庭被深深的悲哀所淹没。

quiz.question: ____ in awe
quiz.explanation: 目瞪口呆，敬畏地目瞪口呆。Tourists would gape in awe at the Grand Canyon. 游客们会敬畏地目瞪口呆地看着大峡谷。

quiz.question: _______ drape
quiz.explanation: 窗帘，窗帘帘布。She hung elegant curtain drape in the living room. 她在客厅挂上了优雅的窗帘帘布。

quiz.question: _____ hunt
quiz.explanation: 狙击，狙击狩猎。The experienced hunters went on a challenging snipe hunt. 经验丰富的猎人进行了一次具有挑战性的狙击狩猎。

quiz.question: ________ obstruction
quiz.explanation: 气管，气管阻塞。The doctor cleared the dangerous windpipe obstruction. 医生清除了危险的气管阻塞。

quiz.question: ________ ban
quiz.explanation: 水管，水管禁令。The drought led to a strict hosepipe ban in the region. 干旱导致该地区实施严格的水管禁令。

quiz.question: ________ bagpipe
quiz.explanation: 风笛，苏格兰风笛。The piper played traditional Scottish bagpipe at the wedding. 风笛手在婚礼上演奏传统的苏格兰风笛。

quiz.question: ___ tripe
quiz.explanation: 牛肚，牛肚。The traditional recipe called for slow-cooked cow tripe. 传统食谱要求慢煮牛肚。

quiz.question: _________ suit
quiz.explanation: 细条纹，细条纹西装。The businessman wore a sharp pinstripe suit to the meeting. 这位商人穿着一套笔挺的细条纹西装参加会议。

quiz.question: _________ periscope
quiz.explanation: 潜望镜，潜艇潜望镜。The captain looked through the submarine periscope at the surface. 船长通过潜艇潜望镜观察水面。

quiz.question: _____ together
quiz.explanation: 私奔，一起私奔。The young lovers planned to elope together against their families' wishes. 这对年轻恋人计划违背家人的意愿一起私奔。

quiz.question: ___ ___ mope
quiz.explanation: 闷闷不乐，坐着闷闷不乐。Don't just sit and mope about your problems—take action! 不要只是坐着为你的问题闷闷不乐——采取行动！
